concept.title: Control closed-caption styling
concept.shortdesc: You can provide styling information for closed-caption tracks using the ClosedCaptionStyles class. This sets the style for any closed captions that are displayed by your player.

conbody.p: This class encapsulates closed-caption styling information such as the font type, size, color, and background opacity. An associated helper class, ClosedCaptionStylesBuilder, facilitates working with closed-caption style settings.
